title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Introducing Amazon S3 Access Points for FSx for NetApp ONTAP (STG217)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 介绍适用于 FSx for NetApp ONTAP 的 Amazon S3 访问点 (STG217)
abstract: Learn how Amazon S3 Access Points simplifies managing access with your Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP file data. Understand the benefits of using S3 Access Points which include access to services that work with S3 using FSx for ONTAP data, all without application changes or moving data out of file storage. Learn how to scale access for large, shared datasets, restrict access to VPC and specific account IDs, and use FSx for ONTAP file data with applications and services that work with S3.
abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon S3 Access Points 如何简化对 Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP 文件数据的访问管理。了解使用 S3 Access Points 的优势，包括使用 FSx for ONTAP 数据访问与 S3 配合使用的服务，无需更改应用程序或将数据移出文件存储。了解如何为大型共享数据集扩展访问权限、将访问限制到 VPC 和特定账户 ID，以及将 FSx for ONTAP 文件数据与支持 S3 的应用程序和服务配合使用。
